ygData.subject: Re: newbie- im
ygData.msgSnippet: No worries, U can still go to zones the other way round. There are hidden paths. ... From: Entreri  To:  Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
No worries, U can still go to zones the other way round. There are
hidden paths.
